name: No Gas Racing!
description:
No Gas Racing! it's a platform and racing game where your goal is to be the first to complete all the laps of the circuit avoiding different obstacles.

Right now you can play a very early prototype version of our game where you can try the controls, the movment and overall the game feel.

We want to highlight that we have a from that you can fill out once you have played the prototype. That would help us a lot in order to be able to achieve a better game.

English form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ZBnTWuUKg2ZVpLobnpEEclzFjNKKAiLoJE8GL4EFKCE/pre...

Spanish form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/16Ag9y8aV3QRjkeMPKyQ3mx4MQ_Sg6Ke4-gGon4ha2ow/pre...
